Articles.Content:
this, if made, would probably become popular quickly....

the idea is to have a prop in IVAs that would look like a hand crank that if used could restore power to a craft in the event that one accidentally loses all power due to loss of panels or leaving warp on too long...

oh course this would probably require a plugin so just saying but this would still be cool to have

discuss below
NearFuture has Capacitors that hold a charge that you have to click on to discharge to charge batterys.

NearFuture has Capacitors that hold a charge that you have to click on to discharge to charge batterys.

i know that but this also works for those time when you crash and all thats left is the capsule
